headline: Cognizant and the North Carolina Turnpike Authority Collaborate to Modernize Toll Operations
summary: Cognizant (Nasdaq: CTSH) today announced a strategic partnership with the North Carolina Turnpike Authority (NCTA) to develop and implement a next-generation tolling back-office system. With the first stage under way, this multi-stage engagement aims to deliver a scalable, API-driven architecture that integrates seamlessly with partners including Mastercard and Volvo Car USA.
